links.title: Get Transform Rules
links.description: Fetches all Transform Rules in a zone.

links.title: Update Transform Rules
links.description: Updates the Transform Rules of a zone.
links.curl:
curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/rulesets/phases/undefined/entrypoint" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"name":"My ruleset","description":"My ruleset to execute managed rulesets","kind":"root","phase":"http_request_firewall_managed","rules":[{"description":"Execute the OWASP ruleset when the IP address is not 1.1.1.1","expression":"ip.src ne 1.1.1.1","action":"execute","action_parameters":{"id":"4814384a9e5d4991b9815dcfc25d2f1f"},"ref":"my_ref","enabled":"true","logging":{"enabled":"true"}}]}'

name.description: The human readable name for the ruleset

description.description: An optional description of the ruleset
An optional description of the rule
description.example: Execute the OWASP ruleset when the IP address is not 1.1.1.1

expression.description: The expression of the rule to match traffic on

action.description: The action to take when the rule matches

action_parameters.description: The parameters to configure the given action

ref.description: An optional reference for the rule, defaults to the ID

enabled.description: Whether the rule should be run

logging.description: The parameters to configure how the rule generates logs

enabled.description: Whether a log should be generated when the rule matches

name.description: The human-readable name of the ruleset.

phase.description: The phase where the ruleset is executed.

action.description: The action to perform when the rule expression matches.

description.example: change request based on ip location

oneOf.description: The configuration parameters for the rewrite action.

uri.description: The URI rewrite configuration to rewrite the URI path, the query string, or both.

path.description: The new URI path sent to the origin.

expression.description: An expression defining a dynamic value for the URI path or query string.

value.description: The new static value of the URI path or query string.

query.description: The new query string sent to the origin.

expression.description: An expression defining a dynamic value for the URI path or query string.

value.description: The new static value of the URI path or query string.

object_definition.title: Transform Rules
